attributes.action: Introduce Life Skills and Competencies into the School Curriculum.
attributes.additional_details: I am new the Special Constable at South Wales Police and a student at the University of South Wales. As a new Special Constable I have been shocked by the amount of young people that lack life skills and competencies which aren’t being taught at home which could potentially hinder their futures.
attributes.background: I would like Government to incorporate  Life Skills and Competencies into the School Curriculum.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. PHSE already covers a range of life skills, so you'll need to set out exactly what you'd like to be included in the curriculum.  
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

It looks like you're in Wales, where education is devolved to the Senedd, so you might want to petition there instead:

https://petitions.senedd.wales/
